      • postAvlReportWhenAppropriate

        public static void postAvlReportWhenAppropriate(AvlReport avlReport)
        To be called when system has a new AVL report. Batches the reports together. If have enough reports (as specified by avlReportsBatchSize) then actually writes them to the API.

        Synchronized in case multiple threads used when accessing the avlReports cache

        Parameters:
        avlReport -
